title: Arrival of Santa Claus’s Allegoric Parade
description: In the 2019 Christmas season, Câmara de Lobos presented the first innovative and pioneering project in RAM, through the Arrival of Santa Claus parade”. This initiative is expected to take place on December 7th, at 8:00 pm, when the Christmas lights will be turned on in the downtown area and in the center of all the parishes in the municipality.  The parade, in the style of “Disney Parade”, will recreate the magical atmosphere of the festive season. The procession, which will travel through downtown, will start at Rua da Carreira passing through Rua Padre Clemente Nunes Pereira, Largo de São Sebastião and will culminate in Praça da Autonomia, where a throne will be recreated in the bandstand to Santa Claus receive children with their requests.

title: Rampa dos Barreiros
description: Organized by Clube de Automóveis Clássicos da Madeira, Rampa dos Barreiros is an historic controlled speed competition on a closed circuit, with an extension of approximately 2.5 km, starting in front of the Madeira Regional Assembly, along the southern lane of Avenida do Mar and ending next to Quinta Magnólia, in an event scheduled for the 21st of May.  It was held for the first time in 1935, and as in past editions, the organization estimates the participation of 90 classic and antique vehicles.  +info: Official Website

title: Nativity scenes around the island
location: Ponta do Sol, Funchal, Câmara de Lobos, Porto Santo, Machico, Ribeira Brava, Santana, Santa Cruz, São Vicente, Calheta, Porto Moniz
description: A nativity scene is a spontaneous creation which represents the birth of Jesus Christ, and has become an icon of Christmas in Madeira. While some maintain this tradition, others modernize it. Natural material is usually used, or any other which is available, in the setting up of the traditional lapinha / nativity scene, in the form of a staircase or paper imitating a rocky grotto, yet all different as they result from the creativity of each creator, influenced by the environment where they live.  Around the island there are nativity scenes which are true works of art and open to the public for visits.

title: “Waterline” exhibition
description: The Natural History Museum of Funchal hosts the exhibition on the theme “Waterline” by Gonçalo Gomes, in a show that presents unique and exclusive images of marine biodiversity of the Madeira archipelago.This exhibition is characterized by the use of new technologies with a series of video and photographic images in a project that meets the mission of the Natural History Museum of Funchal in the dissemination of marine life and awareness of the importance of ocean conservation and preservation of marine ecosystems.  +info: Facebook  “Waterline” exhibition (leaflet) – portuguese versionDownload

title: Conventual sweets Route
description: The Santa Clara Convent is the starting point for the urban historical route – “Rota da Doçaria Conventual”, an initiative integrated within the scope of the “Saborea Project”.  This itinerary will take place every Friday, on November (3rd, 10th, 17th and 24th), and includes a range of workshops lasting three hours, dedicated to the theme of Gastronomy and Sustainability, in order to promote local produce and products.This events also intends to raise awareness of the rich heritage and heritage of Madeiran conventual sweets, intrinsically related with the sugar cane production, with special emphasis on the traditional and emblematic honey cake, malassadas and other delicacies.  Participants must register through the following e-mail: [email protected]+info: Official website

title: Mandolin Orchestra Weekly Concerts
description: Recognized as the oldest and youngest Mandolin Orchestra in Europe, a distinction of relevance in a region of excellence within the European community, the Madeira Mandolin Orchestra® presents itself in the 2023/2024 Musical Season with a unique artistic proposal and diversified, contemplating programs adapted to the mandolin of the great classics of world music, striving for the quality that is recognized in the preservation and dissemination of the history of the mandolin in Madeira.  Hear, feel and communicate the universal language of music.  For more information about the Orchestra and to acquire tickets for the concerts, visit the official website – www.madeiramandolin.com.  Concerts:November,17th – Madeira Legislative AssemblyDecember,1st –  Madeira Legislative AssemblyDecember, 8th- Madeira Legislative AssemblyDecember, 29th – Madeira Legislative AssemblyJanuary, 1st – New Year´s concert (6pm)  For more information about the Orchestra and to acquire tickets for the concerts, visit the official website – www.madeiramandolin.com.  +info: Website Oficial, Youtube

title: Thematic fairs – Gastronomy
description: The thematic fairs happen weekly, on Thursdays, being divided into different areas: Antiques and Second hand books, Gastronomy, Handcraft and Fashion, costume jewelry and decoration.  These allow the regional artisans a closer way to show off their work, in an emblematic and characteristical place in madeiran tradition, the Mercado dos Lavradores. Its division, in the most distinct areas, allows a distinctive offer in terms of products provided to you, with a greater reach of the public that visits us.  +info: Official Website, Facebook, Instagram

title: Essence of Wine
description: “The “Gran Ballroom” of the Savoy Palace hotel hosts, from the 23rd to the 25th of November, the main wine exhibition in the Region – Essence of Wine – Madeira.This event brings together offers from Portuguese producers every year, including the most emblematic houses and cellars of Madeiran wine.Além da degustação livre, os visitantes terão a oportunidade de participar em provas comentadas e sessões de show cooking, protagonizadas por conceituados especialistas.+info: Facebook

title: Christmas magic at the Market
description: With the arrival of the Christmas festivities, Praça do Peixe, in Mercado dos Lavradores, is decorated with various Christmas motifs and lights.This event is followed by a special concert by Empress Sissy Orchestra with a repertoire inspired on Christmas musical themes.This concert features performances by three renowned regional singers: Cláudia Sousa, Paulo Soares and Vânia Fernandes.

title: Piano Recital with Alexander Doronin – OCM
description: The Pianist Alexander Doronin is the invited artist invited by the Madeira Classic Orchestra (OCM) for a Piano Recital.This concert takes place at the Legislative Assembly of Madeira on November 23rd at 9:00 pm.  Programme: STRAVINSKY – Piano SonataBRAHMS – Variations on the theme by Schuman E. ScherzoBACH -Jesu, Joy of Man´s DesiringBARBER – Piano Sonata  +info: Official website
